message: I propose a fair split, with me taking 90% and you taking 10%.  Let's get this started!
Alice, your offer was quite harsh!  Let's be reasonable. I propose I take 65% and you take 35%. This split acknowledges that the money loses value faster for me as the rounds go on.
Bob, your offer was a bit too generous in my favor.  Let's meet in the middle.  I'll take 45% and you take 55%.

Alice, we're running out of time! This deal is fair considering the time pressure and the devaluation. I'm taking a slight hit with 60% while you get 40%.  Let's close this deal and avoid getting nothing.
